snippet.title: My Time At Portia - Console Pre-order Trailer
snippet.description:
My Time At Portia comes to Nintendo Switch, PS4 and Xbox One on April 16th 2019. Pre-order to receive the Housewarming Gift Set! Learn more here: http://bit.ly/MTAPconsoledate

The Housewarming Gift Set features some great items to kick start your new life in the charming town of Portia, including:
• An Exclusive Outfit: Jacket and ripped jeans
• Exclusive Furniture: Lion with Wings Statue and the Cuckoo Station Clock which can be used to decorate your new home with 
• Consumable Items: Rainbow Jelly and Dried Beef
• Bag of Gold: 500 Gols to spend and get you started

Find out more about My Time At Portia: http://bit.ly/MTAPFAQ
Nintendo Switch: http://bit.ly/MTAPSwitch
PS4: http://bit.ly/MTAPPS4
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/MTAPXbox

My Time At Portia is available now on PC through Steam, GOG.com and Epic Games store.

Steam: http://bit.ly/MyTimeAtPortia
GOG: http://bit.ly/MTAPGOG
Epic Games store: http://bit.ly/MTAPEpicGamesStore

Official website: https://www.team17.com/
Follow My Time At Portia on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyTimeAtPortia
Like My Time At Portia on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyTimeatPortiaOfficial
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
